Key Match Events: Mitchell Marsh scored 177* from 132 balls with 26 boundaries and 9 sixes
Australia overcame a target of 307 with 8 wickets and 32 balls to spare
Pre-Game Insights: Pat Cummins won the toss and opted to bowl first
Glenn Maxwell and Mitchell Starc were absent from the Australian XI
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match reflections provided in the article
Miscellaneous Highlights: Young Tawhid Hridoy was the top-scorer in Bangladesh innings with 74
Adam Zampa claimed 2 wickets for 32 runs in Bangladesh innings
Others: Australia lost a wicket early on in the chase when Travis Head played on while trying to take on Taskin Ahmed
David Warner made 53 runs before being dismissed by Mustafizur Rahman
Steve Smith finished not out on 63* from 64 balls
